commit.message: Use a temporary file to read output of PrintPropertiesMain

Revert prevention/recovery measures for stray VM output

Just throw a more useful exception and leave the user to resolve
the root cause.
Disable VM warnings polluting XML on stdout

Recover or report stray VM output from PrintPropertiesMain

On an XML parse error, try again after stripping the prefix up to
the XML prelude.

Failing that, include the process output in the thrown exception
to help the user diagnose the root cause.
